name: VIRGIN NATURAL STRAIGHT
description:
This product is is VIRGIN and has no chemical process. Therefore what you are paying for is Indian hair in it's purest form! Our hair is 100% human, full cuticle, unprocessed, natural, virgin and therefore the most unaltered perfect hair available in the market of hair extensions.

You will NOT find any animal hair and or fibers in our products. 

-MACHINE WEFT
-Virgin Natural Straight Indian Hair with a slight wave when wet. 
-Can be worn wavy or straight.  
-Each pack is 3.5 to 4 oz, you will need 2 packages for a full head. 
-Can last up to 1 year with proper care

SHIPPING:
All orders are shipped same day coming from our factory warehouse in INDIA. It takes 3-5 business days for shipment to our office and EXPRESS shipped to you after final inspection. If you have any questions or concerns please contact us IMMEDIATELY! 

-If product is in stock in our office it will be shipped immediately overnight to you. 

THIS PRODUCT IS ALSO AVAILABLE IN HAND TIED, PLEASE EMAIL FOR SPECIAL PRICING.

name: VIRGIN NATURAL WAVY
description:
-MACHINE WEFT
-Deeper wave than natural straight
-Can be worn straight or wavy
-Each pack is 3.5 to 4oz, you will need 2 packs for a full head
-Can last up to 1 year with proper care
-Please allow 2-3 business days to process your order.

name: NEW PRODUCT Lace Closure- Natural Straight
description:
NOTE: IF YOU PURCHASE A CLOSURE YOU MAY ONLY NEED JUST 1-2 BAGS OF WEFT HAIR DEPENDING ON THE DESIRED THICKNESS. 

Product Description
-The Natural Straight Swiss Lace Closure piece is sewed to the crown of your head in order to blend seamlessly with your hair extensions. These closure hair pieces allow you to have the freedom and versatility to style your hair in any direction while giving you the assurance youve been looking for. 

-The base is made of a swiss lace mesh material meant to simulate your scalp. Unlike other closures that are made of a polyurethane rubbery material you are giving your scalp a chance to breathe although covered up. 


Product Summary
-Hair Type: Straight Virgin Remy Indian hair
-Base Material: Swiss Lace 
-Knots: Bleached and invisible
-Baby Hair: Included in front
-Part Direction: Can part in any direction
-Base Dimensions: 3" wide, 4.5 " front to back
-Density: 120% 

Color: Available in virgin 1B and 2, can be colored 
We can custom make you a closure. Lead time for color will take up to 10 working days. 

SHIPPING:
All orders are shipped same day coming from our factory warehouse in INDIA. It takes 3-5 business days for shipment to our office and EXPRESS shipped to you after final inspection. If you have any questions or concerns please contact us IMMEDIATELY!

name: FINGAZ DVDs
description: Learn step by step instructions on how to do a sew in within 1 hour with no bumps and no glue. You will have a smooth flat finish. Maximize your income and start making money today.
